scriptConfig.style: .custom-header{;width:100%;text-align:center}.custom-header__logo{max-width:800px;margin:21% 2% 2% 2%;width:80%}@media only screen and (min-width:779px){.custom-header__logo{margin:19% auto 1%}}@media only screen and (min-width:1153px){.custom-header__logo{margin:286px auto -200px;padding:0 0 270px}}@media only screen and (min-width:780px){.caption-and-content-layout__caption-container{padding-top:0}.inline-content-panel-layout__content{margin-left:calc((99.99% - 10px)*.090909090909091 + 10px);padding:0 0 25px;width:calc((99.99% - 10px)*18/22 - 10px)}.inline-content-panel__content-item{margin-left:0;width:100%}}
